channel.title: Visionary - Envision a Future Beyond Greatness
channel.description:
[FONT=Comic Sans MS][CENTER][URL=http://visionary317.com/][img]http://i.imgur.com/B7Zs42q.png[/img][/URL]
[B][SIZE=4][U]Developers:[/U][/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/developericon_zpsda8c6d5c.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/raw+envy/"]Raw Envy[/URL] - Server + Client Developer & Project Leader [IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/developericon_zpsda8c6d5c.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/wolfs+darker/"]Wolfs Darker[/URL] - Server Developer [IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/developericon_zpsda8c6d5c.png[/img] [Open] - Server Developer [IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/developericon_zpsda8c6d5c.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/chex/"]Chex[/URL] - Server Developer [IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/developericon_zpsda8c6d5c.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/Tringan/"]Tringan[/URL] - Server + Client Developer [IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/developericon_zpsda8c6d5c.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/Zion/"]Zion[/URL] - Client Developer
[IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/forum-icon_zps33be71bd.gif[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/Hype-/"]Hype-[/URL] - Forum Developer [IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/forum-icon_zps33be71bd.gif[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/klaus/"]Klaus [/URL]- Website Developer
[B][U][SIZE=4]Credits:[/SIZE][/U][/B]
Our development team! [URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki"]Runescape Wiki[/URL] - The majority of our data and research came from there Any supporters - The Rune-Server Community[/CENTER]
[CENTER][I][SIZE=4][b][u]Part I: Introduction[/u][/b][/SIZE][/CENTER]
The main game experience in Visionary is player killing because I feel like that is the biggest reason why people play servers and which is what I enjoy the most when I play servers but however I do realise that some people play for skilling and for PvM and for a server that cares for it's players and has a great community which is why we have everything. All skills will be working and trainable, there will be many bosses to defeat including a few customs bosses in dangerous places such as the wilderness to involve PvM and PvP into 1 enjoyable experience. So basically Visionary aims to please everyone and to bring a great fun and enjoyable server for everyone to play on!
After running my previous server Notorious and peaking around 400 players at its peak I now know what makes and breaks a server, plus not only this I have learnt what the players want and also how to advertise a server correctly, how to manage a server correctly and more... Visionary will have tons of new content and changes compared with Notorious and will include fully working bank tabs, nex, higher data being loaded (2011 era feel) and much more!
[CENTER][I][SIZE=4][u][b]Part 2: Media, Recent Updates & Project Support[/b][/u][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[center][SPOILER=Media]
[CENTER]Client settings interfaces:
[img]http://puu.sh/b9x5h/1fc2b6c36a.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/aIqxF/7ca4808172.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/b9xCC/7dfea29ac1.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/aIqzJ/275844c410.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/xXQ1ELl.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ok9zBWV.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ErvfF1y.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tuARaFI.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qHM8vhw.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/aMHqz/a08c955144.jpg[/img]
Bank tabs & searching:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NrVab5F.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZS3mnEe.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7GVagQK.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jGOh36q.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UhjHSFR.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7XrCItA.png[/img]
HD Minimap:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oVvvZQJ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gaw1eBr.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/b4Qx1/634306afb8.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/b4QDL/41f6272fb1.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/b4QFU/95aec02014.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/b9xhI/4a5e0a823d.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Updates Log] 6th August:
Started up the Visionary project!
Updates can be found throughout the thread as we post them...
All media will be kept updated above also :)
You can no longer cast hunter teleport spells above level 20 Wilderness The strung rabbit foot will now be equipped in the amulet slot Cave horrors now die immediately after their death animations Getting a dragon claws drop from the tormented demons will now unlock the achievement The Dust devils again use the correct animation when attacking Lumbridge steps now work and have sendoptions on first click Run energy now drains at the same rate as Runescape Energy potions are now fully working Fully working bank tabs added All buttons in the bank are now functional Updated our maps to 525 Effects system added - prayer renewals fully added using the system Killstreaks system in wilderness - globally announces killstreak and rewards
[/SPOILER]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Ways you can show your support for Visionary:[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[I]Like/follow/subscribe on our social media:[/I]
[I]Use one of our support banners! Click below for a few.[/I]
[SPOILER=Support signatures]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B7Zs42q.png[/img]
[code][noparse][CENTER][URL=http://visionary317.com/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/B7Zs42q.png[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER][/noparse][/code]
[img]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Logo2_zps2bc13923.png[/img]
[code][noparse][CENTER][URL=http://visionary317.com/][IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Logo2_zps2bc13923.png[/IMG][/URL][/CENTER][/noparse][/code]
[/SPOILER][/center]

item.title: Visionary - Envision a Future Beyond Greatness
item.dc:creator: @Raw_Envy Raw Envy
item.description:
@Raw_Envy wrote:

[FONT=Comic Sans MS][CENTER][URL=http://visionary317.com/][/URL]

[B][SIZE=4][U]Developers:[/U][/SIZE][/B]

[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/raw+envy/”]Raw Envy[/URL] - Server + Client Developer & Project Leader
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/wolfs+darker/”]Wolfs Darker[/URL] - Server Developer
[Open] - Server Developer
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/chex/”]Chex[/URL] - Server Developer
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/Tringan/”]Tringan[/URL] - Server + Client Developer
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/Zion/”]Zion[/URL] - Client Developer

[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/Hype-/”]Hype-[/URL] - Forum Developer
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/klaus/”]Klaus [/URL]- Website Developer

[B][U][SIZE=4]Credits:[/SIZE][/U][/B]

Our development team!
[URL=http://“http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki”]Runescape Wiki[/URL] - The majority of our data and research came from there
Any supporters - The Rune-Server Community[/CENTER]

[CENTER][I][SIZE=4]Part I: Introduction[/SIZE][/CENTER]

The main game experience in Visionary is player killing because I feel like that is the biggest reason why people play servers and which is what I enjoy the most when I play servers but however I do realise that some people play for skilling and for PvM and for a server that cares for it’s players and has a great community which is why we have everything. All skills will be working and trainable, there will be many bosses to defeat including a few customs bosses in dangerous places such as the wilderness to involve PvM and PvP into 1 enjoyable experience. So basically Visionary aims to please everyone and to bring a great fun and enjoyable server for everyone to play on!

After running my previous server Notorious and peaking around 400 players at its peak I now know what makes and breaks a server, plus not only this I have learnt what the players want and also how to advertise a server correctly, how to manage a server correctly and more… Visionary will have tons of new content and changes compared with Notorious and will include fully working bank tabs, nex, higher data being loaded (2011 era feel) and much more!

[CENTER][I][SIZE=4]Part 2: Media, Recent Updates & Project Support[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[center][SPOILER=Media]

[CENTER]Client settings interfaces:

Bank tabs & searching:

HD Minimap:

[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Updates Log]
6th August:

Started up the Visionary project!

Updates can be found throughout the thread as we post them…

All media will be kept updated above also

You can no longer cast hunter teleport spells above level 20 Wilderness
The strung rabbit foot will now be equipped in the amulet slot
Cave horrors now die immediately after their death animations
Getting a dragon claws drop from the tormented demons will now unlock the achievement
The Dust devils again use the correct animation when attacking
Lumbridge steps now work and have sendoptions on first click
Run energy now drains at the same rate as Runescape
Energy potions are now fully working
Fully working bank tabs added
All buttons in the bank are now functional
Updated our maps to 525
Effects system added - prayer renewals fully added using the system
Killstreaks system in wilderness - globally announces killstreak and rewards

[/SPOILER]

[B][U][SIZE=4]Ways you can show your support for Visionary:[/SIZE][/U][/B]

[I]Like/follow/subscribe on our social media:[/I]

[I]Use one of our support banners! Click below for a few.[/I]

[SPOILER=Support signatures]

[/SPOILER][/center]

Read full topic
